info.task: navigate to first unchecked radio button in group
info.title: Navigate to the first unchecked radio button in a group in reading mode

setupScript.name: setFocusBeforeRadioGroup
setupScript.description: sets focus on a link before the radio group, and hides the group heading

user: Navigate to the first radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
instructions.raw: Navigate to the first radio button in the group. Note: You may need to press certain commands (such as Down Arrow) multiple times to hear all information relating to the radio button and group.
instructions.mode: Ensure NVDA is in browse mode by pressing Escape. Note: This command has no effect if NVDA is already in browse mode.

assertions.expectation: Name of the group, 'Pizza Crust', is conveyed
name of the radio button, 'Regular crust', is conveyed
State of the radio button, 'unchecked', is conveyed
Position of the radio button, 1, is conveyed
Number of radio buttons in the group, 3, is conveyed
